short_definition: The legal fiction where one is presumed without any proof whatsoever to have a certain state of mind or capability.
long_definition_html: The legal fiction where one is presumed without any proof whatsoever to have a certain state of mind or capability.
long_definition_markdown: The legal fiction where one is presumed without any proof whatsoever to have a certain state of mind or capability.
long_definition_text: The legal fiction where one is presumed without any proof whatsoever to have a certain state of mind or capability.
